# Change the Title/Subtitle/Caption


```{r How.2-Complete-Code-Example, fig.dim=c(13,12)}

survey1 %>%
  calculate_smry_individual("Q1COVID19",
                            "Algeria") %>%
  plot_smry_individual(.title = "New title",
                       .subtitle = "New subtitle",
                       .caption = "New caption")


```
